channel.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
channel.description:
...Client to runescape? I know, it sounds crazy, and there are many more better clients, but... ..I like scar!
I got my stupid little idea, when i was reading something here. Anyway, my first vision would be:
[scar] program vision;
const World=1 // "Set worlds" procedure worlds; begin
case world(8) of // Should there be the 8(8 worlds to make) 1: Openwebpage(http://something.something.com) //and so on.. 2: -.- 3... //etc. [/scar]
Now, that wouldn't yet work, I know, main lines and such. But, if this works I have another vision for this, and what I would do with it... ;D

item.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, none of you are explaining yourselves very well.

As far as I know, there is no way to change client in scar while a script is running, BUT, if the script is not running you can go to client > change client title, this changes the client WITHOUT the need for the crosshair. While the script is running you can use “FindWindow(title : String);” or even Activateclient;.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to make with scar a

item.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

Morgoth:

And that’s very, very close to impossible to make something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to make with scar a

item.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
item.dc:creator: @Morgoth Morgoth
item.description:
@Morgoth wrote:

But that RuneSpace C+ is not a client. It just interacts with Java client, and probably gets the highscores from the web.
What I understand by term “client” is this:

  1. Install fresh operating system. (no JRE!!!)
  2. Install SCAR.
  3. Open the uber client script.
  4. Run it.
    Conclusion) It must run and play the game using ONLY SCAR on a machine with no Java installed.
    And that’s very, very close to impossible to make something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to make with scar a

item.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

[quote=“Janilabo, post:11, topic:27929”]TUN it was Shocker who made it (RuneSpace C+). (Well, maybe Cruel has made one too? :O)

Here is the picture: Click

Though, it was months ago. Don’t know for how many people he sold it to… If I remember right, it was encrypted by Kaitnieks.[/quote]

I don’t want thing like that. It looks ugly. I just want it to open webpage for game, then drag the crosshair to RS window…

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

If the scar window is visible, then I suppose that it would be possible to have the script set the client automatically, or you could use on of SRL’s procedure that finds the RS Client.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible to make with scar a
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

BTW, While i’m here, is it possible to take a picture of bitmap from SCAR window, and get it drag it to runescape window?

[scar]
program vision2;
const
blahblah…

procedure drag?; //?

Findbitmap blah blah // Whatever?
holdmouse(x,y,true)
Movemouse(somewhere)
Releasemouse(x,y,true)
[/scar]
etc.

So, my point is, that if I could make scar open runescape window, then drag crosshair to it, get colors, (For lazy ones) so they should just press “run” and it’s there.
Is it possible? I’m not gonna try anything, before, I know, it’s possible

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:5, topic:27929”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=41372.msg504704#msg504704 date=1164238999]

[quote author=arr0w link=topic=41372.msg504582#msg504582 date=1164237594]
not a client[/quote]

Cruel made one.
[/quote]He meant a client made with SCAR, though.[/quote]

Yes. Cruel, or someone made a client in scar that connected to the runescape applet and played the game in scar, much like SS but in scar.

item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

…Client to runescape? I know, it sounds crazy, and there are many more better clients, but…
…I like scar!

I got my stupid little idea, when i was reading something here. Anyway, my first vision would be:

[scar]
program vision;

const
World=1 // “Set worlds”
procedure worlds;
begin

case world(8) of // Should there be the 8(8 worlds to make)
1: Openwebpage(http://something.something.com) //and so on…
2: -.-
3… //etc.
[/scar]

Now, that wouldn’t yet work, I know, main lines and such. But, if this works I have another vision for this, and what I would do with it… ;D
